text: Ultimate Football Club is a Malaysian football club based in Jalan Semarak, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. They currently play in the third-tier division in Malaysian football, the Malaysia M3 League. ==History== Ultimate Football Club is a club founded in 2014 in Klang Valley, Kuala Lumpur and participated in several competitions in Klang Valley. In 2018, the club has won the AXA Klang Valley League after defeating Gombak FA 3-2 on penalties following a dramatic 1-1 draw after extra time and been eligible to compete in the Malaysia M3 League. On 17 February 2019, the club competed in the Malaysia FA Cup for the first time in the club's history. ==Season by season record== Updated on 8 June 2020. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:89%;" |- !Season !Division !Position !Malaysia Cup !Malaysian FA Cup !Malaysian Charity Shield !Regional !Top Scorer (All Competitions) |- ! style="text-align:center;"| 2019 | style="text-align:center;"|Liga M3 | style="text-align:center;"|5th of 14 | style="text-align:center;"|DNQ | style="text-align:center;"|Second round | style="text-align:center;"|– | style="text-align:center;"|– | Chukwu Nnabuike (22) |- ! style="text-align:center;"|20201 | style="text-align:center;"|Liga M3 | style="text-align:center;"| Season abandoned | style="text- align:center;"|DNQ | style="text-align:center;"|DNQ | style="text- align:center;"|– | style="text-align:center;"|– | None |- |} Notes:' : 2020 Season cancelled due to the 2020 Coronavirus Pandemic, no promotion or league title was awarded although this is now subject to a possible legal challenge ==Players== ===First-team squad=== ==Management team== ===Club personnel=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! style="background:blue; color:white; text- align:center;"|Position !! style="background:blue; color:white; text- align:center;"|Name |- |President || Mohammed Fitri Ahmad Ziyadi |- |Secretary || Aslam Abu Seman |- |Manager|| Mohammed Fitri Ahmad Ziyadi |- |Technical Director || |- |Head Coach || Azman Adnan |- |Assistant Coach || Rudie Ramli |- |Goalkeeper Coach || Azizon Abdul Kadir |- |Physio || Husni Naim Mat Latif |- |Kitman || Mohd Hidzir Yahaya |- |} == Honours == === Domestic competitions === ==== League ==== *AXA Klang Valley League : Winners (1) : 2018 ==References== ==External links== *Official Facebook Page Category:Malaysia M3 League Category:Football clubs in Malaysia
